answers.answer: She should see her doctor and have her levels checked
I would agree with that one.  With diabetes, you don't want to mess around, because it is known to mess up the kidneys.  So, whatever this is, you need to get it early.

question: Why would my mothers skin taste sweet to her? Everything she tries to eat taste to sweet. She is a type 2 diabetic. She is losing weight because she can't stand the sweetness and I am worried about her. I hope you can help.
title: Sweet tasting skin
